Body: Is there a media player that can read ReplayGain tags from the music files and adjust play volume accordingly? Also it will be appreciated if it can live scrobble playing tracks to a chosen Last.fm profile.As a bonus: Can it display currently playing song to a bluetooth handsfree with screen, like SE MW600?Thanks in advance.
Title: Music player that utilizes ReplayGain tags and can scrobble to Last.fm?

history.Text: Is there a media player that can read [ReplayGain][1] tags from the music files and adjust play volume accordingly? Also it will be appreciated if it can live [scrobble][2] playing tracks to a chosen Last.fm profile.As a bonus: Can it display currently playing song to a bluetooth handsfree with screen, like [SE MW600][3]?Thanks in advance.  [1]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Replay_Gain  [2]: http://www.last.fm/help/faq?category=Scrobbling  [3]: http://www.sonyericsson.com/cws/products/accessories/overview/mw600
Music player that utilizes ReplayGain tags and can scrobble to Last.fm?
